resources.name: examples-gitHub-restcountries
resources.title: GitHub RestCountries example
resources.description: Sample implementation of a C# CountryService for the RestCountries API. Shows how to structure a tool/plugin for MCP. Simple example with external NuGet package.

resources.name: examples-html-plugin
resources.title: HTML Plugin example
resources.description: C# code example of an MCP-compatible HTML plugin. Useful for reference when generating new tools. Contains tools with multiple type of Elicit requests.

resources.name: mcp-editor-plugins
resources.title: MCP Editor plugins
resources.description: Lists all plugins that are available in the MCP Editor environment.

resources.name: mcp-editor-assemblies
resources.title: MCP Editor Assemblies
resources.description: Lists all assemblies loaded on the MCP server and that can be used in tools. Default System and Microsoft assemblies are excluded.

resources.name: example-epub-decoder
resources.title: Epub decoder example
resources.description: Sample implementation of an IContentDecoder for extracting and decoding content from EPUB files. Use as a template for building decoders for document formats.

resources.name: example-audio-decoder
resources.title: Audio decoder example
resources.description: Sample IContentDecoder implementation for processing and extracting information from audio files. Useful for reference when building audio content decoders.

resources.name: example-oboclient-scraper
resources.title: OBO Client scraper example
resources.description: Sample ContentScraper implementation for retrieving data using delegated permissions (OBO pattern). Use as a model for scrapers that connect to external APIs with authentication.

resources.name: example-teams-scraper
resources.title: Teams scraper example
resources.description: ContentScraper class designed for retrieving information from Microsoft Teams. Reference this for scraping logic that targets Microsoft Graph or Teams data.

resources.name: fileitem-model
resources.title: FileItem model
resources.description: Reusable class for storing file content, file URIs, filenames, and MIME types in the application. Used throughout the MCP stack to pass or persist file data.

resources.name: mcp-editor-decoders
resources.title: MCP Editor decoders
resources.description: Lists all decoders registered in the MCP Editor environment, including supported MIME types for each decoder.

resources.name: example-mcpeditor-scraper
resources.title: McpEditor scraper example
resources.description: Sample implementation of a custom ContentScraper that works with non-HTTP, custom URIs instead of web APIs. Demonstrates how to build scrapers that process internal or protocol-based resources in the MCP stack.
